BIO

Hello, dear friend! Welcome to my website! I am Kaliyeva Aigerim, 23 years old. I'm from Kazakhstan. I am a third year student at Shanghai University. My specialty is Information Management and Information Systems. Below you can read about my hobbies.

Traveler

#travelling #world #countries

I really like to travel, to learn different cultures. I have already been to different countries of the world. Photos from my travel can be found on the page "Travel".

Florist

#flowers #tulips

One of my hobbies is looking after, growing flowers. I have a lot of them at home. I know different kinds of flowers, I really adore them. The most favorite are tulips.

Learn languages

#languages #world #culture

I also love to learn different languages. Learning a new language, I get to know the culture of this people. I can speak Kazakh, Russian, English and Chinese. Now I am learning Turkish and Korean.
